displayAddress: 1 Moorland Road, Bath, Somerset, BA2 3PJ
detailedDescription: FREEHOLD INVESTMENT FOR SALE Mixed use investment Located on popular local retail parade Total annual gross rent of £27,750 Ground floor let until January 2030 Ground floor tenant in occupation since 2016 First floor let on 12 month AST DESCRIPTION The ground floor comprises a lock-up business (Class E) unit, currently in operation as a café. The sales space is open plan with additional storage accommodation as well as commercial kitchen and WC to the rear. Included with the property demised to the tenant is a small forecourt which is used as an outside seating area, together with a gated path to the side of the property which leads to a small garden. The first floor is accessed through a separate pedestrian entrance at the rear of the property and comprises a two bedroom flat with good levels of natural light to all rooms. The flat is considered to have potential to be used for student accommodation subject to necessary statutory consents.

displayAddress: 1-2 Piccadilly Place, London Road, Bath, Bath and North East Somerset, BA1 6PL
detailedDescription: FREEHOLD FOR SALE Double Shop Front Let to Dorothy House until 06 September 2028 £160,000 for the Freehold Interest DESCRIPTION 1-2 Piccadilly is an attractive semi-detached, three storey Grade II Listed property with Bath stone elevation under a slate title roof. Internally the property comprises two residential flats on the first and second floors with commercial accommodation on the ground floor. The ground floor shop is self-contained from the upper floors and comprises a U-shaped sales area which benefits from two shop windows facing onto London Road. Ancillary storage and WC facilities are located at the rear of the ground floor.

displayAddress: 1, 2 & 4 Signal Box Yard, Lower Bristol Road, Bath, Somerset, BA2 3JQ
detailedDescription: Three newly constructed ground floor commercial units available to let forming part of the Signal Box Yard development, which includes 316 build-to-rent apartments. The units form part of a block of four commercial spaces and benefit from direct frontage onto Lower Bristol Road, one of the main routes into Bath. The units are finished to a shell specification, providing a flexible layout for a range of potential uses, subject to planning. Tenant incentives are available to assist with the cost of fit-out works.

displayAddress: 10 Templeback, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS1 6FL
detailedDescription: 10 Templeback is a modern office building located in the core of Bristol City Centre. The 4th floor has been refurbished and benefits from VRF AC, new LED lighting, new ceiling grid and an abundance of light and wonderful views overlooking the Floating Harbour. The ground floor suite is due to be refurbished in Q1 2026. The building benefits from a refurbished double height reception and a new shower block in the basement offering an additional six showers and high quality changing area.

displayAddress: 11 St. James’s Parade, Bath, Bath and North East Somerset, BA1 1UL
detailedDescription: Grade II Listed Class E Unit This Grade II Listed property comprises open plan ground floor retail and is accessed through a shared entrance. The property benefits from good levels of natural light with a glazed frontage onto St James Parade and windows at the rear. Ancillary storage, kitchenette and W/C facilities are located on the Lower Ground Floor.

displayAddress: 12 Trim Street, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 1HB
detailedDescription: The premises comprise a Grade II Listed mid-terrace period retail unit with a double frontage on Trim Street and Upper Borough Walls. The premises benefit from open plan retail accommodation on ground floor with a single WC, kitchenette facilities and ancillary storage at lower ground floor level. PLANNING The property is considered to have planning consent under Use Class E (Commercial, Business & Service) of the Town & Country Planning Act (Use Classes Order) 2020. Interested parties are advised to make their own planning enquiries with the local planning authority, Bath and North East Somerset Council.

displayAddress: 124 Rodway Road, Patchway, Bristol, Gloucestershire, BS34 5PG
detailedDescription: FREEHOLD INVESTMENT FOR SALE – By Informal Tender PROPOSAL For sell by way of informal tender with sealed bids to be received no later than Friday 5th September 2025 at 5pm. GUIDE PRICE Offers in excess of £175,000. DESCRIPTION The property comprises a 2-storey building arranged as a retail unit (currently in use as a betting shop) on the ground floor with redundant flat on the first floor to which there is no access. Internally, the ground floor provides open plan sales space with ancillary storage and WCs located at the rear. We were unable to access the first floor but understand it comprises a two-bedroom flat. The tenant is responsible for reinstating the internal staircase at lease expiry. To the side and rear are gardens and a garage, which provide some scope for development, subject to the necessary consents & agreements.

displayAddress: 124 Wells Road, Bath, Somerset, BA2 3AH
detailedDescription: 124 Wells Road is a terraced building providing office accommodation over ground, first and second floors. The ground and second floors are available either as a whole or as separate floors and provide open plan office accommodation which benefit from suspended ceilings, perimeter trunking and air conditioning. Two car parking spaces are available with the property in a barrier-controlled car park to the rear, subject to negotiation.

displayAddress: 132A Walcot Street, Bath, Bath and North East Somerset, BA1 5BG
detailedDescription: TO LET – Class E Unit DESCRIPTION The premises offers quality sales or office space on the ground floor. The lower ground floor provides ancillary storage, fitted kitchenette, WC facilities and rear access to the office. The premises would be well suited for a retail or office occupier requiring a window display.

displayAddress: 18-18a Monmouth Place, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 2AY
detailedDescription: The property comprises newly refurbished office accommodation at ground and first floor levels of a Grade II Listed building with Class E use consent. The current configuration provides a reception office, meeting room, storage room, kitchen and two WC’s off a lobby area at ground floor and office use at first floor and mezzanine level (from first floor). There is a steel spiral staircase to the rear of the ground floor which provides access to the first floor and up to the mezzanine. The rooms at first floor benefit from good levels of natural light from font and rear windows and a number of skylights.

displayAddress: 2.07 Newark Works, Lower Bristol Road, Bath, Somerset, BA2 3DZ
detailedDescription: The communal kitchen and breakout space is located in the Crain Hall which acts as the site’s community hub where a variety of breakout spaces can be found including a kitchen island, sofas, dining tables, and spaces for informal meetings. Formal meeting space is provided, the building has 2x 6-person meeting rooms and 2x 12-person meeting rooms. Kitchen essentials are provided along with fridges, freezers, ice machines, tea, coffee, dog biscuits, and more. Showers and lockers are located on the ground floor. W/c facilities can be found throughout the property on all floors. Newark Works holds a variety of social events throughout the month and occupiers are welcome to hold their own events at the premises also. Newark Works is the only remaining 19th century works of the highly significant engineering firm, Stothert & Pitt. The development will retain much of the character of the building; set to provide unique and iconic industrial style workspaces. The huge halls and high ceilings, exposed brickwork and industrial steel, combine to provide a dramatic working environment, to provide a creative hub for forward thinkers, thought leaders and entrepreneurs. It is a dynamic and vibrant destination at the heart of the fast-evolving Bath Quays business district, within the new Bath Enterprise Zone. This is a home for single entrepreneurs, burgeoning creative businesses and well-established companies alike. Follow the link for a 3D walk through of the development and to see the available space: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=t8MsouEWgD6

displayAddress: 22 St. Lawrence Street, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 1AN
detailedDescription: 4,154 sq ft of high quality, part fitted second floor offices in central Bath. The offices are undergoing refurbishement to include new meeting rooms and kitchen / break out area, LED lighting, new AC, full access raised floor and new entrance / reception area.

displayAddress: 24 Broad Street, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 5LW
detailedDescription: The property comprises a ground floor lock up unit forming part of a larger four storey, Grade II listed end-terrace building. The property benefits from a double shop frontage onto Broad Street. Internally, the property comprises an open plan sales area to the front of the unit which leads up to a communal WC and storage space. The property is well-suited to both retail or office uses.

displayAddress: 25 Queen Square, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 2HX
detailedDescription: The property comprises office suites spread over five floors of a Palladian Neo Classical, Grade I Listed Building. Internally, the offices are well proportioned and in good condition, benefitting from original period features and large sash windows overlooking Queens Square. Access to the property is through a secure, communal lobby and stairwell. There are shared kitchen and WC facilities. Parking is available by way of separate negotiation.

displayAddress: 251-253 London Road East, Batheaston, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 7RL
detailedDescription: The property comprises well presented, open plan offices over ground, first and second floors within a detached Grade II listed converted former workhouse. The specification includes, – Largely open plan accommodation. – Gas central heating. – Open ceilings with painted timber trusses. – LED & display lighting. – Laminate flooring. – Male / Female WCs to each floor. Externally, there is a small courtyard providing bin storage and a communal garden, both the southern boundary. There is no dedicated parking, although street parking is available immediately in front of the property.

displayAddress: 26A&B Shaftesbury Road, Bath, Somerset, BA2 3LJ
detailedDescription: 26 Shaftesbury Road is a detached property comprising two self-contained retail units, each providing open-plan sales areas with ancillary storage, kitchenette, and WC facilities located to the rear. Both units benefit from prominent glazed frontages onto Shaftesbury Road, offering good levels of natural light. The retail accommodation was originally constructed as a single unit and in our opinion has the potential to be reinstated if desired. The first-floor accommodation is accessed via an internal staircase to the rear of 26B and provides open-plan space with potential for residential conversion, subject to the necessary statutory consents. The property also benefits from a parking space at the side of the 26A.

displayAddress: 28 High Street, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 5AJ
detailedDescription: The property comprises retail accommodation arranged over ground and first floors with additional ancillary accommodation at the rear of both floors. WC and staff facilities located at the rear of the first floor. The premises also benefits from a prominent glazed frontage onto High Street and a return glazed frontage onto Upper Borough Walls.

displayAddress: 2nd & 3rd Floors , 39 Gay Street, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 2NT
detailedDescription: The Grade II Listed building forms part of a mid-terraced Georgian townhouse constructed of Bath ashlar stone. Each floor provides interlinked offices providing the flexibility for an occupier to have private meeting rooms / offices. Sash windows placed to the front of the property and to the rear provide excellent levels of natural light to all floors. A single W/C is provided off the landing for the benefit of the suites. Second and third floor office available together or separately.

displayAddress: 3 Queen Square, Bristol, City of Bristol, BS1 4JQ
detailedDescription: 3 Queen Square comprises an impressive self-contained mid terrace Georgian property arranged over five floors. The property was previously an office and is arranged as such throughout. However, it would lend itself to a number of uses subject to planning. Externally, the property benefits from a small, fenced courtyard to the front, currently fitted with Sheffield hoop bike racks.

displayAddress: 34 Monmouth Street, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 2AN
detailedDescription: NEWLY RENOVATED PREMISES TO LET DESCRIPTION This mid-terraced Grade II Listed property has been recently renovated to a high standard and comprises open plan sales spaces on ground floor with WC facilities and ancillary storage at basement level. The property would be suitable for a variety of uses within Class E and benefits from a glazed frontage.

displayAddress: 35 Gay Street, Bath, Bath and North East Somerset, BA1 2NT
detailedDescription: CLASS E UNIT TO LET Description The property comprises flexible open plan retail accommodation with ancillary storage located on first floor and lower ground floor. The sales area is over ground floor comprising a front and rear show room and has an attractive double fronted window display with frontage onto Gay Street. The rear sales area benefits from great levels of natural light from a large sky light. W/C facilities are located on the ground floor and first floor.

displayAddress: 37 Boulevard, Weston-Super-Mare, Somerset, BS23 1PE
detailedDescription: Town centre location Let to Wards Solicitors LLP at £35,000 pax 8 years remaining with no break options Large car park to rear £425,000 excl. VAT for Freehold Interest DESCRIPTION The property comprises a three-storey semi-detached period building set under a multi pitched tiled roof and part flat roof. The property has stone elevations and a bay window to the front over ground and first floors. The property benefits from a large car park off Albert Quadrant with parking for 11 cars. Entrances are provided at lower ground floor as well as the upper ground floor (first floor) directly from The Boulevard. The former leads to a modern reception comprised within a single storey extension to the side of the building. In addition, the ground floor includes meeting rooms/offices, a kitchen and two storage rooms. The upper floors are accessed via a single staircase and comprise cellular offices, storage and welfare accommodation. The property is set within mature landscaped grounds with a tarmac car park to the rear. In total the site comprises approximately 0.07 hectares (0.17 acres).

displayAddress: 4 George Street, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 2EH
detailedDescription: TO LET – Retail / Office Unit DESCRIPTION 4 George Street is a Grade II Listed mid-terrace property with an attractive glazed shopfront onto George Street. Internally the ground floor comprises open plan sales with additional sales on the rear mezzanine. WC and shower facilities are located in the basement together with a fitted kitchenette. The upper floors provide useful office and ancillary accommodation, suitable for a variety of business needs.

displayAddress: 41 High Street , Chipping Sodbury, BS37 6BA
detailedDescription: He property comprises an open plan ground floor retail bar / restaurant unit. W/C facilities are located at the rear of the property. The property is not Listed but is within Chipping Sodbury Conservation Area. The property offers flexible accommodation and is considered eminently suitable for a range of alternate uses, subject to any necessary planning consents for change of use.

displayAddress: 44 St. James’s Parade, Bath, Bath and North East Somerset, BA1 1UQ
detailedDescription: GROUND FLOOR RETAIL / OFFICE UNIT FOR SALE DESCRIPTION The property comprises a ground floor lock-up business unit (Class E) situated over ground and basement floors. The ground floor provides largely open plan sales area in a broadly L shape and the two large glazed windows overlooking St James Parade allow good levels of natural light into the sales area. To the rear is a single pedestrian access from the shop to the common lobby and access via stairs down to basement treatment rooms and ancillary storage.

displayAddress: 4th Floor, Cambridge House, Henry Street , Bath , BA1 1JT
detailedDescription: Cambridge House comprises ground and five upper floors. The fourth floor provides an open plan office space benefitting from raised carpet floors, LED and LG7 lighting, suspended ceilings, air conditioning, fitted kitchen, WC and shower facilities.

displayAddress: 5-6 Oatlands Avenue, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS14 0SX
detailedDescription: The units comprise two ‘lock-up’ retail units, currently interlinked through a single pedestrian access, available as a whole or individually. Both units have excellent double glazed window frontage on to the main shopping parade. Unit 5 is the smaller of the two comprising a ground floor retail and ancillary space only whilst Unit 6 has a return frontage and benefits from first floor ancillary accommodation. The premises have most recently been used a nail and beauty salon but is suitable for a variety of uses, under class E. Interested parties should note the property remains fitted as such but an extended rent free period package is available to offset the costs of removal, subject to terms.

displayAddress: 53 Market Place, Chippenham, Wiltshire, SN15 3HU
detailedDescription: The property comprises a floor lock-up business (Class E) unit situated over ground, first and second floors. The property has rendered elevations under a pitched tiled roof and attractive retail frontage. The ground floor is open plan and broadly regular in shape, narrowing slightly to the rear. A staircase is set halfway back on the ground floor giving access to the first floor where additional sales space is provided in two rooms, front and rear, along with a small staff kitchen and single WC. A further staircase allows access to the upper top floor, again split into two rooms off the stairs provides additional storage space.

displayAddress: 5a, Here, Bath Road, Arnos Vale, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS4 3AP
detailedDescription: Suite 5a has been refurbished by the Landlord and fully fitted with meeting rooms and kitchen area, ready for immediate occupation. A central city office space less than 1.5 miles from Temple Meads Station with over 220 parking spaces – a rare commodity in Bristol! We’ve also got an abundance of secure and sheltered bike storage if you prefer two wheels over four. Everything you need is HERE, meeting rooms and break-out zones, super fast broadband and healthy on site fast-food and coffee. There’s always something going on HERE, our social diary is packed with exclusive events for our tenants. Within the clean lines of the exterior you’ll find light and functional but stylish, upcycled and repurposed workspaces of all shapes and sizes. Offering traditional leases to flexible and fully inclusive serviced offices. Every business at HERE enjoys an inspiring blank canvas they can make their own. Whatever your requirements, give us a call.

displayAddress: 66 Queen Square, Bristol, City of Bristol, BS1 4JP
detailedDescription: Built in 2015, 66 Queen Square is an iconic building on the corner of Bristol’s Queen Square. The building totaling 61,500 sq ft, comprises a modern office block alongside a Grade II listed Georgian terrace. The 3rd floor provides a contemporary and stylish office space which can be offered fully furnished. The floor is 13,371 sq ft and has been fitted to include several meeting rooms, tea points and break out areas.

displayAddress: 72 Queen Square, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS1 4JP
detailedDescription: 72 Queen Square is a self-contained Grade II listed building, providing high quality office accommodation overlooking Queen Square.

displayAddress: Abbeygate House, 1a Abbeygate Street, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 1NP
detailedDescription: The building is part of a large Georgian townhouse, constructed with Bath ashlar stone. The first and second floor comprises modern, open plan office space with carpet tile flooring, suspended ceiling incorporating LED lighting. The property benefits from w/c facilities, a large ground floor lobby with a wide staircase to the upper floors and a dedicated office entrance from Abbeygate Street.

displayAddress: Armourers House , 50 Queen Charlotte Street , Bristol , BS1 4JE
detailedDescription: The property comprises Cat A, open plan office accommodation on the ground floor of Armourers House, a new residential development just off Queen Square. The landlord is willing to undertake a bespoke fit-out to suit the incoming tenants’ requirements.

displayAddress: Beacon Tower, Colston Street, Bristol, BS1 4UX
detailedDescription: The part 11th floor has brilliant views over the south and west of the city. The floor was fitted out 5 years ago to a high standard incorporating 30 desks, 2 meeting rooms, a large break out area, kitchen and high desk/stool area. One car parking space comes with the lease. WC’s are on half landings and the building itself has a remodelled reception area and break out area, new fast passenger lifts serving all floors, state of the art basement cycle hub with 6 showers, changing area, drying room and lockers. The bar Bambalan at ground/podium level offers a terrace and rooftop bar. The flex office provider Desklodge will be opening in early 2023 in the building offering additional flex offices, meeting rooms and a rooftop event space.

displayAddress: Braebourne House, Woodlands, Bradley Stoke, Bristol, Gloucestershire, BS32 4JT
detailedDescription: Newly refurbished high quality offices. – Open plan floor plates – New carpet tiles – All office suites have air conditioning – Low glare LED lighting – Double glazing – Raised floors with floor boxes – New kitchen facilities on each floor – Contemporary WCs and Shower facilities – Covered Bike Rack – 20 car spaces, 10 per floor – 2x EV Charging points

displayAddress: Buchanans Wharf North, Ferry Street, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS1 6HN
detailedDescription: Buchanan’s Wharf North overlooks Bristol’s Floating Harbour and is a self-contained ground floor office. The office provides a high quality, open plan working space with fitted boardroom and kitchenette. There is one on site car parking space included with the lease and the opportunity for more spaces on a separate licence. The space has been refurbished to a high quality finish with stylish wooden flooring throughout and modern lighting.

displayAddress: Bull Wharf, Redcliff Street, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS1 6QR
detailedDescription: Bull Wharf is a modern office building arranged over 6 floors with stunning views over Bristol’s floating harbour. The 2nd, 5th and 6th floors are newly refusrbished along with the reception and common parts. The office building also benefits from a new shower block and secure basement car and bike parking. In addition to the Cat A works, the 2nd floor has been fitted and furnished and provides suites of 1,135 sq ft and 3,195 sq ft which are ready for immediate occupation.

displayAddress: First And Second Floors , 1A Queen Square, Bath, Bath and North East Somerset, BA1 2HA
detailedDescription: TO LET First & Second Floor Offices – Only £15 per SqFt per annum. 1a Queen Square is a Grade I Listed building. Access to the premises is through a shared entrance on Old King Street. Internally the property comprises cellular office accommodation over first and second floors. Both floors have offices either side of the central staircase and benefit from good levels of natural light. Kitchenette and W/C facilities are located on the first floor half landing, as well as a small office / meeting room. The offices are available as a whole or on a floor by floor basis, the latter available at a rent to be agreed.

displayAddress: First Floor , 11 Laura Place, Bath, Somerset, BA2 4BL
detailedDescription: DESCRIPTION The premises are accessed through a shared entrance from Laura Place and comprise office accommodation split into 4 suites with additional storage. W/C and kitchenette facilities are located on the first-floor landing. All office suites benefit from great levels of natural light with large sash windows are the front and rear of the premises.

displayAddress: Former Better Gym, St. Pauls Road, Bournemouth, Dorset, BH8 8DL
detailedDescription: The property comprises largely open plan floor space with prominent frontage. The ground floor consists of an entrance/reception area leading to a large open plan gym, with a former weights area located on the first floor. This area could possibly be excluded from the demise if required and incorporated into the ASDA supercentre. The ground floor also contains male and female w/cs, changing and shower facilities and a large, separate studio space. Recently, the property has traded as Better Gym Bournemouth but is considered suitable for a variety of uses, subject to planning.

displayAddress: Former Claire’s Unit, Asda Mall, Lower Earley District Centre, Lower Earley, Reading, Berkshire, RG6 5TT
detailedDescription: The property comprises a regular shaped open plan unit with ancillary accommodation arranged to the rear. Previously occupied by Claire’s, the unit is fitted to their standard corporate fit out. Access is via the main centre concourse and via rear delivery doors from the wider ASDA car park. The unit has a single WC off the rear stores. An electric security shutter is provided to the main entrance. Heating is by way of ceiling mounted comfort cooling cassette. We are advised no gas supply exists to the unit.

displayAddress: Global House, Bridge Street, Guildford, Surrey, GU1 4SB
detailedDescription: Global House is arranged over basement, ground and two upper floors and comprises an original building dating back to 1876 with later additions. The property benefits from views over the river Wey Predominantly the building is of brick and slate construction, as is typical in the immediate vicinity. Internally, the fit out and configuration has been bespoke designed to suit the vendors requirements and as a result could benefit from redesign and refurbishment if remaining as an office use. For floor plans, please click the link within the brochure attached to this listing for access to the data room. Subject to obtaining the necessary planning consents, the building has potential for a range of alternative uses. Offers are invited for the freehold interest.

displayAddress: Hanover House, The Square, Lower Bristol Road, Bath, Somerset, BA2 3BH
detailedDescription: First Years Rent Offered at a Discounted Rent of £25,000pa excl VAT GROUND FLOOR OFFICE WITH 3 PARKING SPACES AVAILABLE TO LET Hanover House is a two-storey building in the west end of The Square. The ground floor office is a modern, self-contained suite providing open plan space and benefits from a fitted kitchen, staff break out area & meeting room. WC facilities are located within the suite and across the shared lobby. The property also benefits from 3 car spaces located immediately outside the building.

displayAddress: Housing Development Site, 17 Station Road, Midsomer Norton, Radstock, Somerset, BA3 2AZ
detailedDescription: This brownfield site extends to approximately 0.63 acres and comprises a several buildings in need of renovation and conversion. These include a substantial detached period dwelling, which has previously been converted into a one-bedroom and a three-bedroom apartment, and various outbuildings historically used for storage. These buildings are now dilapidated and the garden and ready for redevelopment. Planning – Midsomer Norton falls with the in Bath and North East Somerset Local Planning Authority, who granted planning permission on 24 April 2020 for the conversion of the existing buildings and the erection of new buildings to form 11 no. residential units (reference 20/00241/FUL). This planning permission was made as extant through the successful grant of a certificate of lawfulness for the commencement of development (reference 22/00515/CLEU) on 30 March 2022 and the discharge of the pre-commencement conditions.

displayAddress: Land At Rolle Road, Great Torrington, Devon, EX38 8AX
detailedDescription: The property has been granted planning permission for 155 open market dwellings and commercial accommodation, with potential for a further 18 dwellings with the inclusion of the additional land mentioned below. The property comprises 19.98 acres of land registered under three titles. There are also additional discussions ongoing with Devon County Council regarding the potential acquisition of a further 1.33 acres of land adjacent to the site. The property is held freehold under three title numbers: DN338862, DN400282, DN313129. The additional 1.33 acres is held under title number DN358082. The key planning applications include the following: Northern Site – 1/0039/2016/OUTM South West Water Site – 1/1231/2018/OUTM Devon County Council Site – 1/0524/2020/FULM Torridge Vale – 1/0526/2020/FULM Former Creamery – 1/0528/2020/REMM Please enquire with the agents for further details.

displayAddress: Land At Thaxted Road, Saffron Walden, Essex, CB10 2UQ
detailedDescription: The property was granted planning permission at appeal on 13 May 2021 for the erection of 35 dwellings (reference APP/C1570/W/20/3264407). The site provides 28 open market units comprising a mix of two and three bed terraced and semi/link-detached houses. The site also provides 7 affordable units comprising 6no. two-bedroom flats (affordable rented) and 1no. three-bedroom semi-detached house (shared ownership). The property comprises 2.27 acres or thereabouts of land. The site is under development and has been partially constructed. The majority of the infrastructure works have been completed, including drainage works, and the estate road has been constructed but not finished. Plots 1-7 are substantially complete and Plots 8-35 are constructed in varying degrees to the foundation level (including piling). The retaining wall and the undercroft car parking associated with the affordable rent apartments (Plots 27-32) have also been constructed.

displayAddress: Lower Ground Floor , 8 Belmont, Bath, Bath and North East Somerset, BA1 5DZ
detailedDescription: Lower Ground Floor Office Available on a Short Term Lease. The lower ground floor comprises two office rooms, at the rear and front. The premises benefit from having a private entrance at the front of the property and use of a paved garden at the rear which is shared with all tenants. Each floor has its own WC.

displayAddress: Marina Gardens, 49 Martingale Way, Portishead, Bristol, Somerset, BS20 7SG
detailedDescription: The property comprises a ground floor purpose built cafe / restaurant to let with potential for external seating, fully fitted with new commercial kitchen, hot counter, extraction and refrigeration. The unit is located close to the Marina, newly established housing as well as other similar leisure / F&B operators.

displayAddress: Newark Works, Lower Bristol Road, Bath, Somerset, BA2 3DZ
detailedDescription: Newark Works is the only remaining 19th century works of the highly significant engineering firm, Stothert & Pitt. The development will retain much of the character of the building; set to provide unique and iconic industrial style workspaces. The huge halls and high ceilings, exposed brickwork and industrial steel, combine to provide a dramatic working environment, to provide a creative hub for forward thinkers, thought leaders and entrepreneurs. It is a dynamic and vibrant destination at the heart of the fast-evolving Bath Quays business district, within the new Bath Enterprise Zone. This is a home for single entrepreneurs, burgeoning creative businesses and well-established companies alike. Follow the link for a 3D walk through of the development and to see the available space: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=ENDC35tpzKA

The building offers different suits and arrangements to suit individual businesses. Portland house has been recently refurbished to provide grade A space. The suite at office 1 on the second floor offers 553 sq ft (51.37 sqm) approx. of available space. Throughout the property are kitchenette and WC facilities.

displayAddress: Offices At Coombe Lodge, The Coombe, Blagdon, Bristol, Somerset, BS40 7RE
detailedDescription: Coombe Lodge is a three storey Grade II Listed former country house. The office accommodation is accessed through a separate entrance at the front of the building. Located on the second floor, each office suite benefits from fantastic views over the gardens and countryside. A communal kitchenette is located on the second floor and WC facilities are on the first floor. There is ample parking on site and as well as a gym located in the basement, which all occupiers have use of.

displayAddress: One Portwall Square
detailedDescription: One Portwall Square is a vibrant new office development offering flexible floorplates for a modern generation of tenants. Designed by AHMM, the scheme combines contemporary architecture with a focus on post-Covid occupant wellbeing and sustainability to deliver a new office for Bristol. In May 2023, One Portwall Square was awarded Best Commercial Workplace at the South West Regional BCO Awards, and also triumphantly won first place at the National Awards held in October. This is the first time the award has been won in Bristol and the Region. The floors are extremely flexible and can be subdivided to offer suites from 2,000 sq ft – 12,000 sq ft.

displayAddress: Oxleaze Way, Paulton, Bristol, Somerset, BS39 7AN
detailedDescription: The land is rectangular, broadly level and has been cleared. The site extends to approximately 0.8 acres. The site is surrounded by residential development on its eastern, western and southern boundaries. The land to the north is also consented for residential development. PLANNING Detailed planning permission was granted on 9th December 2022 for: “Construction of a 48 place early years nursery facility and outdoor play area (Class E); public open space village green; residential development of 8no. dwellings (Class C3); vehicular and pedestrian accesses from Paper Lane and Oxleaze Way; landscaping and other associated ancillary works” (reference 22/01348/FUL) The nursery has now been constructed to the south of the property (on land between Hallatrow Road and Paper Lane) and whilst the various conditions associated with that part of the development have been discharged, there are still some pre-commencement conditions that need to be discharged in connection with the subject land before work can begin on site. We are advised that the CIL contribution for the development is: £164,662

displayAddress: Portland House 4 Albion Street, CHELTENHAM, Gloucestershire, GL52
detailedDescription: Portland House provides an attractive period building at the front with accommodation over four floors with a modern rear section. This rear part provides open plan offices on two levels and the accommodation can be taken in part or as a whole. The building offers different suits and arrangements to suit individual businesses Portland house has been recently refurbished to provide grade A space. The accommodation benefits from gas central heating, retained period features, perimeter trunking and a private car park providing 12 allocated spaces.

displayAddress: Portwall Lofts, Portwall Lane, Bristol, City of Bristol, BS1 6NB
detailedDescription: Where English heritage meets authentic luxury and the morning sun shines through 300 window panes. Portwall Lofts is a boutique workspace, within an impressive Victorian red brick warehouse, on the origins of Bristol’s 13th century Portwall. It’s undergone an extensive renovation to bring you 5,671 ft of ultra sustainable space – bursting with natural light, character and historic charm – across the two top floors.

displayAddress: Portwall Place, Portwall Lane, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS1 6NA
detailedDescription: Portwall Place is an impressive five storey landmark office building located less than five minutes from Bristol Temple Meads. The building is being transformed and repositioned into a modern, contemporary workplace. The next generation of Portwall Place will provide comfortable and welcoming spaces to work, interact and collaborate. The floors have been redesigned to offer beautiful terrace spaces with spectacular views over Bristol’s floating Harbour. From the moment you arrive, every element of your experience has been considered to provide a best-in-class experience. Portwall Place offers outstanding onsite amenities to promote productivity and wellbeing, including: Bleacher seating within the Atria with built-in presentation facilities Reception Café Business Lounge on Level One Bookable communal Meeting Rooms and conference facility Health And Fitness Suite on site 4,000 Sq Ft Rooftop Pavilion and Terrace Over 7,600 Sq Ft of Terrace spaces 262 space Cycle Store 89 Car Parking spaces

displayAddress: Queen Square House
detailedDescription: Historic Queen Square is one of Bristol’s most sought after business addresses. In addition to the attractive working environment and ease of parking, the Square benefits from a range of bars, restaurants and hotels in close proximity. Temple Meads station is within easy walking distance, as are the major retail facilities of Broadmead and Cabot Circus.

displayAddress: Queens Quay, 33-35 Queen Square, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS1 4LU
detailedDescription: – Exceptional back to frame refurbishment. – 30,000 sq ft best in class office. – Ability to accommodate HQ requirements or floor by floor lettings. – Rare dual vistas floorplates – Unique workspace environment benefiting from views of Queen Square and Bristol’s Floating Harbour. – Responsibly built – EPC A, BREEAM ‘Excellent’, Wired Score ‘Platinum’ and Active Score ‘Platinum’. – Central location – Surrounded by an exceptional array of tenant amenity.

displayAddress: Rear Lower Ground Floor, Portland House, 4 Albion Street, Cheltenham, GL52 2LG

The rear lower ground floor suites provides 1,910 sq ft (177.4 sqm) approx. of available space. Throughout the property are kitchenette and WC facilities.

displayAddress: Second Floor, 25 Windsor Castle, Upper Bristol Road, Bath, Bath and North East Somerset, BA1 3DN
detailedDescription: SECOND FLOOR OPEN PLAN OFFICE WITH PARKING TO LET The property comprises the second-floor open plan office space of the former Windsor Castle Inn, the whole now having been converted to office use. Access to the second floor is through a shared entrance at the front of the building. Stairs provide access internally to an open plan suite with kitchenette and WC. The suite benefits from air conditioning, electric convector heating, intercom system and additional lobby space on the landing. The second-floor also benefits from a car parking space at the front of the property set back from the pavement.

displayAddress: Spectrum , Bond Street, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS1 3LG
detailedDescription: Spectrum comprises a multi let office building located in central Bristol, extending to 114,000 sq ft over six storeys. There is an abundance of natural light throughout the building including the impressive double height reception with communal breakout area. The accommodation benefits from raised floors, VRF air conditioning, metal tile suspended ceilings, new WC’s & showers in the common parts, and refurbished lifts.

displayAddress: St. Thomas Court, Thomas Lane, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS1 6JG
detailedDescription: The office has been designed to provide a high-quality workspace on the 2nd floor of St Thomas Court. The Landlord has fitted the space to enable immediate occupation and includes the following. – VRF AC and LED strip lighting – Fitted kitchenette with white goods – 20 x desks – 1 x 8 person glazed meeting room – 8 person lift giving DDA compliant access – Secure cycle storage and shower provisions – EPC C The Landlord will consider flexible lease terms from 12 months. Alternatively, consideration will be given to a LLH sale.

displayAddress: Suite 3 At St Georges Lodge , 33 Oldfield Road, Bath, Somerset, BA2 3NE
detailedDescription: Suite 3 is located at ground floor level adjacent to the generous reception area. The office provides open plan modern office setting benefitting from air heating and cooling. Additionally, there are two meeting rooms at the rear of the suite and a staff room with kitchenette at the front. Tenants at St Georges Lodge also benefit from a communal meeting room, communal conference room and a HIT bike room. There are also showers and a bicycle shelter as well as a communal terrace and garden. There is parking for 10 cars on site and two charging points for electric vehicles.

displayAddress: Suite 4, The Old Brewery, Newtown, Bradford-On-Avon, Wiltshire, BA15 1NF
detailedDescription: Second Floor Office to Let DESCRIPTION The building is a Brewery and Malthouse conversion to offices in c. 1990 and has since been comprehensively renovated to provide contemporary offices set against the background of a dramatic and imposing period building. The offices have a shared lobby / reception area at ground floor with a wide open stair to the upper levels and benefit from a 4 person lift. Internally, the office is broadly open plan with partitioning in place to create a separate meeitng room. The office suite has two WCs, a modern self contained kitchen and has good natural light with views across Bradford On Avon. Occupiers will also benefit from two tandem car parking spaces.

displayAddress: Suites 1 & 2, The Old Brewery, Newtown, Bradford-On-Avon, Wiltshire, BA15 1NF
detailedDescription: The building is a Brewery and Malthouse conversion to offices in c. 1990 and has since been comprehensively renovated to provide contemporary offices set against the background of a dramatic and imposing period building. The offices have a shared lobby / reception area at ground floor with a wide open stair to the upper levels and benefit from a 4 person lift. The available office suites offer well-presented accommodation, finished with carpeted floors, wall mounted radiators and Cat II lighting throughout. Suite 1 provides open-plan office space with a modern fitted kitchenette. Suite 2 is arranged as two open plan office areas, benefiting from large windows that provide good natural light and attractive views across Bradford-on-Avon. Suite 2 also benefits from a modern fitted kitchen and shared WC facilities with Suite 1. The office suites are available either as a whole or on an individual basis. The accommodation includes a limited amount of covered parking.

displayAddress: Talbot Road, Bristol, City of Bristol, BS4 2NU
detailedDescription: LAND FOR SALE – PRICE REDUCTION Proposal – The site is being offered for sale freehold. We are instructed to quote a guide price of £475,000, excl. VAT. Conditional offers upon planning for storage uses / servicing will be considered. Description- The site comprises approximately 0.78 acres (0.316 ha) of cleared ground, forming part of the former Brislington Rail Station which was closed in the 1960s. Access to the site from Talbot Road is via two tarmac accessways running parallel with the northern and southern boundaries. Planning – The wider site has most recently been used as a scrapyard (a sui generis planning use). Historic records indicate that scrapyard use was authorised at part of the southern area of the site (not forming part of the site for sale) via a Certificate of Lawful Use granted in February 1993 (ref: 92/02695/C). We are not aware of any planning decision explicitly authorising scrapyard use across the site as a whole. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the local planning authority to understand the scope for alternative uses, however, we consider the site lends itself to most open storage uses, subject to planning consent. The site is considered suitable for open storage uses and possibly other forms of development, although applications for residential development and uses with permanent structures have previously been rejected. Offers conditional upon planning may be considered dependent upon terms. Interested parties are advised to contact Bristol City Council’s Planning department on 0117 922 3000 for further information. Services – The site is un-serviced at present, although we are advised an electricity supply can be brought onto site from Talbot Road. Further information is available upon request.

displayAddress: Temple Circus , Temple Way, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS1
detailedDescription: Temple Circus is a high profile seven-storey grade A office building with significant profile in the temple quarter. The Grade A building has recently been refurbished to provide flexible workspace in an outstanding location.Temple Circus has been transformed to provide a welcoming space, designed to impress with a double height reception and business lounge. The office floors have been refurbished and benfit from VRF heating and cooling and LED lighting. The building has achieved the following accreditatations: – EPC B – BREEAM In Use Very Good – Active Score Gold (Targeting) – WiredScore Gold (Targeting) – Mode Score Gold (Targeting)

displayAddress: The Cottage Suite, The Old Brewery, Newtown, Bradford-On-Avon, Wiltshire, BA15 1NF
detailedDescription: OFFICE TO LET – Bradford-on-Avon DESCRIPTION The building is a Brewery and Malthouse conversion to offices in c. 1990 and has since been comprehensively renovated to provide contemporary offices set against the background of a dramatic and imposing period building. The Cottage Suite is accessed through a private entrance off Wine Street. Internally, the premises provides open plan office accommodation over ground and first floors. The office suite benefits from private WC and kitchenette on ground floor. Occupiers will also benefit from two tandem car parking spaces.

displayAddress: The Creamery Building, Avonside , New Broughton Road, Melksham, Wiltshire, SN12 8BT
propertySubType: Bar, Cafe, Gym, Industrial, Nursery, Office, Restaurant, Retail, Workshop
detailedDescription: A RANGE OF CHARACTERFUL NEWLY REFURBISHED STUDIOS TO LET The Creamery has undergone a significant transformation to reveal its characterful features and generous, full height interior. The stripped-back space offers flexibility for a variety of uses and provides occupiers with a interesting place to work, coupled with excellent on-site amenities. Refurbishment includes: – Characterful, full height space – New WCs and kitchenettes – New fully insulated roof with rooflights – EPC A

displayAddress: The Foundry, Brunel Rooms, 1 Straight Street, Bristol, BS2 0FQ
detailedDescription: The Building dates back to the late 1800s and provides an abundance of character in a central location. The suite has been refurbished to incorporate a contemporary design complimenting the rustic feel and character features of the building. The space has been comprehensively refurbished to include the following: Comfort cooling LED lighting Fitted kitchen Demised WCs and shower facilities Exposed brickwork finish and original historic features Four parking spaces included Basement storage space with roller shutter access from street level There is an opportunity to negotiate additional discounted car parking licenses located to the rear of the property adjacent to Temple Meads station direct from the Landlord. The Landlord will consider flexible lease terms and the space is available for immediate occupation.

displayAddress: The Malt House, 17-20 Sydney Buildings, Bath, Somerset, BA2 6BZ
detailedDescription: This newly refurbished property comprises part of the lower ground floor of a converted Grade II listed malthouse at 17-20 Sydney Buildings. Accessed via a courtyard, stone-clad steps lead to a small entrance lobby shared with the adjacent office suite. The office is largely open plan, with a series of arched windows running along the north and east sides of the space. Together with the main office there is a separate meeting room, kitchen/breakout area, WCs and shower. The property benefits from modern LED lighting and energy efficient heating/comfort cooling. Externally there is a shared communal garden bordering the Kennet & Avon Canal with views towards Bath Abbey. The property is provided with one parking space in the courtyard, together with additional permit/time limited parking available in the surrounding streets. Dedicated charging for one electric car can be provided upon request.

displayAddress: Third Floor Suite 3, 35 Gay Street, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 2NT
detailedDescription: Small Office to Let DESCRIPTION 35 Gay Street is a grand and attractive, Grade II listed period townhouse. The building is of typical Georgian style with ashlar stone frontage with sash windows. Internally, it comprises of five floors, with the third floor is split into three offices and the available suite is located at the front of the building. The entrance to the property is on Gay Street and shared with the ground floor retail. The upper parts of the building have use of a shared w/c, shower and kitchen facilities.

displayAddress: Third Floor, Suite 2 , 35 Gay Street, Bath, Bath and North East Somerset, BA1 2NT
detailedDescription: 35 Gay Street is a grand and attractive, Grade II listed period townhouse. The building is of typical Georgian style with ashlar stone frontage with sash windows. Internally, it comprises of five floors, with the third floor split into three offices. The entrance to the property is on Gay Street and is shared with the ground floor retail. The upper parts of the building have use of a shared w/c, shower and kitchen facilities

displayAddress: Unit 1 Hynam Court , Eclipse Office Park, High Street, Staple Hill, Bristol, Gloucestershire, BS16 5EL
detailedDescription: Description The property comprises a self-contained three-storey office building situated within Eclipse Office Park. The building has brick elevations set under a multi-pitched clay tile roof. The property comprises a reception area, front office and a meeting room on the ground floor, an office with a kitchenette and a WC on the first floor and an office subdivided by partitioning and ancillary storage on the second floor. The specification includes carpeted and linoleum floors, perimeter trunking, painted plaster walls, suspended ceiling tiles, and mix of integrated LED light panels and halogen light panels. Externally there are 7 car parking spaces

displayAddress: Unit 12, Riverside Court, Bath, Somerset, BA2 3DZ
detailedDescription: 12 Riverside Court comprises a self-contained, end-terrace office building configured over three floors. Internally, there is an entrance hallway leading to stairs to the upper floors, and also to an area designated for staff facilities and break out area. The upper floors provide open-plan accommodation with glazed partitioned meeting rooms. The first and second floors also benefit from good levels of natural light and high ceilings. Externally, the property is provided with 5 parking spaces. Key Features: Carpeted solid concrete floors. Mixture of LED and non-LED lighting. Perimeter and floor trunking Double-glazed aluminium-framed windows. Suspended ceilings. Good ceiling heights on the first and second floors, with a maximum height of 4 meters. Air conditioning.

displayAddress: Unit 14, Brassmill Enterprise Centre, Bath, Bath and North East Somerset, BA1 3JN
detailedDescription: INDUSTRIAL UNIT TO LET An end of terrace ground floor industrial unit forming part of Brassmill Enterprise Centre. The property is constructed of block with rendered external elevations and benefits from an electric roller shutter loading door. A separate single pedestrian point of access is provided. Internally the unit is open plan with small office and single WC. Internal clear height is circa 2.75m. In addition, the property benefits from a tarmacadam secure yard to the front large enough for several vehicles.

displayAddress: Unit 2, Netham View Industrial Park, Netham Road, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS5 9PQ
detailedDescription: The property comprises a mid-terraced open plan industrial unit arranged as a ground floor workshop and mezzanine floor offices with male / female WCs and separate kitchen. The property is constructed of brick and rendered external elevations, under a pitched timber truss roof clad with slate tiles

displayAddress: Unit 6, Leypark Drive, Estover, Plymouth, Devon, PL6 8TB
detailedDescription: The property comprises a ground and first floor lockup retail unit. The ground floor sales area is largely open plan with a WC to the rear. Upstairs, there is ancillary space and staff kitchen. The unit has excellent double glazed window frontage on to the main shopping parade. The premises has most recently been used a nail and beauty salon but is suitable for a variety of uses, under class E.

displayAddress: Unit 6, Oatlands Avenue, Whitchurch, Bristol, City of Bristol, BS14 0SX
detailedDescription: UNEXPECTANTLY BACK ON THE MARKET – RENT FREE PERIOD PACKAGE AVAILABLE TO OFFSET REMOVAL OF CURRENT FITTINGS The unit comprises a ground and first floor ‘lock-up’ retail unit and has excellent double glazed return frontage on to the main shopping parade. The premises have most recently been used a nail and beauty salon but is suitable for a variety of uses, under class E. Interested parties should note the property remains fitted as such but an extended rent free period package is available to offset the costs of removal, subject to terms.

displayAddress: Unit G11, West Swindon District Centre, Swindon, Wiltshire, SN5 7DL
detailedDescription: The property comprises a ground floor retail unit previously occupied by Claire’s. The unit provides an open plan sales area with a prominent shopfront to the main mall, offering strong visibility and display frontage. Ancillary accommodation is arranged to the rear for storage and welfare facilities. The unit is accessed from the principal centre concourse, with additional rear access via delivery doors from the service yard. There is no dedicated WC within the unit; occupiers utilise the shopping centre’s communal facilities. Heating is by way of ceiling-mounted comfort cooling cassette, and we are advised that there is no gas supply serving the unit. 1 car parking space is provided.

displayAddress: Unit N4, New Workshops, Beehive Yard, Bath, Bath And North East Somerset, BA1 5BT
detailedDescription: The property comprises studio office / light industrial arranged on the first floor of a two-storey development. Internally, the space is open plan, with a window to the front and rear. There are shared WC facilities on both first and ground floor. Externally, the property is rendered and painted, below a pitched tile roof.

displayAddress: Units 1 & 2, Boorley Park , Boorley Green , Southampton , SO32 2BX
detailedDescription: The properties comprise two newly constructed ground floor lock up units. Both units benefit from a large glazed frontage which provides excellent levels of natural light and internally the units are open plan and have been finished to a shell condition. Power and water are present. Customer car parking is available in front of the units.

displayAddress: Wessex Garages Site , Pennywell Road, Bristol, City Of Bristol, BS5 0TT
detailedDescription: SHOWROOM PREMISES APPROX 26,581 SQFT ON 1.56 ACRES SITE WITH POTENTIAL FOR ALTERNATIVE USES (SUBJECT TO PLANNING) DESCRIPTION The site is broadly level (there is a slight incline at the north eastern corner) and comprises approximately 1.56 acres (0.63 hectares). The site currently operates as a car dealership under the Wessex Garages brand and there is an existing showroom and workshop situated to the south western segment of the site. The dealership comprises an externally clad two story steel portal frame warehouse and an attached steel portal frame glazed showroom. The unit comprises approximately 25,568 sqft (2,375 sqm) GIA. The remainder of the site is used for car parking associated with the dealership and workshop (approximately 215 spaces). The site has a 108 m (353 ft) approx. frontage to Pennywell Road and a depth of 58 m (190 ft) approx.
